documents.document: @theborowalk Ah me, same as it ever was...
@theborowalk Damn, I'll be covering the Ashbourne Football match that day. #pancakeday
Andrea and I went to see Tango Fire at the Peacock. Stunning dancing from Argentina's best.

This is disgusting! https://t.co/bWawTGl5Uf

Great fun tonight at the Comedy Store, I got to be King Aldread, an ice skater, and to work on a cruise ship! https://t.co/bsXrKUBm8s
Very proud of my MP. https://t.co/Hu4NPT2r09
Randy Newman - In Germany Before the War - Album Version [HD] This was going round my head in Whitehall last night. https://t.co/sBsxdXzXGz
Andrea and I were 20 feet from he speakers tonight. @SadiqKhan and @ShappiKhorsandi where my favourites. https://t.co/Or01pCiGsY
Just back from Whitehall, great to be with so many likeminded people against fascism.
Hawksbee and Jacobs daily - Monday, January 30 | talkSPORT https://t.co/tdXKnwyr32 via @talkSPORT Had a lovely time today with the boys.
@SogsSaunders Can you still score from the half way line?
@PaulHawksbee here's that goal I was telling you about. https://t.co/RmYWOewSWU
@FCFleetTown @FarnboroughFC @abufton39 @tSHandJ If you'd listened I gave him a whole heap of praise!
@BennettArron @Foyles Definitely not going back then! Their loss!
Hey @Foyles why aren't you accepting cash at Waterloo? Just lost a. Customer!
At TalkSport tower. I'll be on @tSHandJ around 1.15.
The petition passed 1M. President Trump will love that.
I'm also going to this later. https://t.co/jEscqrDBvz
I'll be on the Hawksbee and Jacobs show this afternoon, on TalkSport. 1.15-1.45. Looking back at the weekend.
@philchatterley Cheers, but I think I'll leave it to Cumberbatch!
@realDonaldTrump So why not Egypt, Turkey and Saudi Arabia in the ban? Is it because you have work going on there? Tad unfair?
Me and my flaming cock Andrea. #chinesenewyear https://t.co/3vVbh16UEq
1-0 down at half time. It could have been 4, if wasn't for @abufton39 Hello, it's 1-1.
Home game against Chalfont St Peter. https://t.co/XtQdpUvrYj
Happy lunar new year. If you are Chinese then enjoy your flaming cock!
Well done Perth!

Just saw Manchester By The Sea, hell of a film. Casey Affleck is stunning.

@justinmoorhouse Aldersh*t, we call it in Farnborough.

@afcmark1 @Ed_Miliband @paulwaugh @HuffPostUKPol And that doesn't make you feel queasy.
@afcmark1 @Ed_Miliband @paulwaugh @HuffPostUKPol There are so many things I'd like to ask her to say. But I fear she's already on his team!
@afcmark1 @Ed_Miliband @paulwaugh @HuffPostUKPol I would ask her to ask him to grow up, and stop behaving like a spoilt child!
@afcmark1 @Ed_Miliband @paulwaugh @HuffPostUKPol I would have her say that we will not be involved with anyone practicing torture!
Now that's what I call a courgette! https://t.co/cRbnZFcRfl
Aussie friends, did the WACA become the Furnace? Or is it a new ground?
@emmafreud Happy Birthday! Have a ga eat day!
Someone should tell the Dad in that Quick Quid ad that that toast is going to kill him!
Today's best parking award goes to this guy. https://t.co/NNWfYttN5b
Nova Scotia village hosts one of the smallest women's marches, but it's still mighty https://t.co/MMUve3ZUhR
Loved episode 22, of @theimprovathon It's amazing they're still going! How much Rich Energy must have been consumed! Good luck for last3!
Back at Wiltons Music Hall for episode 22 of 25. @theimprovathon
@timbojos @BraddJaffy This might explain. https://t.co/smOQkWmihE
Thank you to @improfthrones for a great night. I've just woken up! If you get a chance, pop down to Wiltons Music Hall to see it.
It's all going on in Highbrow, with the elvish tree of knowledge. #throneofgames https://t.co/nvifQ2wBn0
About to start my third show of the night with the Imprvothon guys. It's 3.15. https://t.co/OMks9C2vF7
Gil Scott-Heron - The Revolution Will Not Be Televised (Full Band Version) For my friends in America! https://t.co/httzFiAQFw
I'm off to see @aJimSweeney later if anyone has any messages. Taking him a new batch of medicine.
@MsAndyPT It's back on now, I was at the cafe and realised it was dead! Soz.
@theborowalk Annoying ain't it.
Lost 5-0. Looks like we're going for the playoffs.
We're 3-0 down at half time. Mind you one of our centre halves is still on his way on the train. Blinking cold.
Another new ground. Royston who are top v @FarnboroughFC who are 2nd. https://t.co/KtG9hBAgwT
Just finished reading Dead Air by Iain Banks. A roller coaster love affair between a shock jock and someone he shouldn't have fallen for.
@nicciardini Have a good one!
@davejohnscomic Bunfight at Joe Corals.
@davejohnscomic Stick on your CV mate, you'll be doing cowboy fillums within the year!
@Grace_Smart You give em hell sweetie! Go pop a cap in their ass!

Great 4-0 win over Barton Rovers by @FarnboroughFC Great performance and a clean sheet!
@RalfLittle Came to see the show tonight. Top work sir! Thoroughly enjoyed it. Lots of good laughs. Cheers.
Really enjoyed #DeadFunny tonight, a fine cast in a dark comedy, if you get a chance, go. It's on till Feb 4th.
Off to see Dead Funny with @MsAndyPT
@realDonaldTrump @CNN I trust CNN more than I trust you!
Tonight I'd to guess I was a cat behaviourist, in a dog kennel, in a kaftan with the hanger still in it using the orange from Jaffa cakes.
Maybe the closure and down grading of 66 A&E & Maternity homes, since 2010 has something to do with the present NHS crisis? FFS!

@quentyquestions @FXMC1957 He doesn't look happy about it.
@ireland His calm, dignity. His sense of humour. His love for justice, his wife and his country. How cool he is in any situation.
Bostock's Cup Just watched this again. Some great memories. I played with these lads! https://t.co/2fApCja1oF
If we'd beaten Swindon Supermarine, Welling, Whitehawk, Stourbridge, Northampton & Wycombe, we'd be away to Spurs, 4th round.
What a joy at the Store tonight, Romanian bell ringing, Nando's, the cas of the Antique Candlebra, and kangaroo gymnastics!
@theborowalk It was flipping late! But why did they let him get in the box?
2-2 draw in the fog. https://t.co/OOxpr5u0sF

Another new ground. This seems like a good deal if you live in Potters Bar! https://t.co/747BX7uGeq
@Arthur_Strong Not bad, I got 12. You should ring up one day.
@Arthur_Strong Coffees?
Beautiful low half moon over the Willesden shunting yard.
@aJimSweeney Sorry to hear that Jim. I'll be down tomorrow mate. See you then.
@josielawrence1 Any chance of opening emails?
Hey @itvracing please don't explain how odds work. And stop that bloke shouting in the ring too!
A very happy new year to you all! I hope it brings all you desire and more.
@mrmichaelsmiley You forgot poof.
Home from the pub, I'll sleep for a week. The volunteers at Crisis this year have been a joy to work with.
Off to my last shift of @crisis_uk Always the hardest. There will be tears. But hopefully a lot of smiles too!
Right, off to the Store for the last Players gig of the year, then on to shift 6 at Crisis.
Off to bed.
Shift 4 was lovely. 253 guests, 7 dogs, 105 volunteers. Bit cold on the gate though.
@Grace_Smart Great ceiling on that one!
I've seen the future, its name is Thistlecrack! Going to be the story for the next 4 years!
253 guests. Busy night. Now to sleep.
Too excited to sleep, with Thistlecrack taking on Cue Card tomorrow at Kempton. I'm going with Thistlecrack. So, off to shift 3.
@managerboardout @MsAndyPT 3 minutes! 3 minutes late! I know you love briefings, but 3 minutes!
Cooked @MsAndyPT and I a full Xmas dinner. https://t.co/rNUtrFCnJ8
